name: After You: Level Escape

In "After You - Level Escape" you need to put all your attention and use paper and pencil to move forward, if you're looking for an easy game, this is not your game.

name: After the Turn

name: AFPS: Airplane Flight Pilot Sim

name: After School

name: After School

name: Aftershock: Coastline

Spend an hour delving deep into a seaside bunker in an uncanny land, uncovering its secrets and surviving against the cosmic horrors which dwell within.

name: After the Fall
summary:
After society's fall hell's children reign over our lands, but their kind only knows chaos and disharmony. Servants of evil turn on their evil brethren tearing them limb from limb and place their spoils on display, while others sacrifice their own flesh to bring suffering and destruction. Pregnant bellies ripe of demonseed threaten to overwhelm resistance, but the tide is turning, and it's time to rise again and reclaim the cities, forests and mountains.

After the Fall is a limit-removing episode made by various members of Doomer Boards, featuring 7 maps of explosive Doom action and monsterless credit maps. This month's project is a sequel to Fall of Society, both led by Glenzinho.

name: Afterland
summary: Afterland is a roguelite FPS Cooperative, each game is a new adventure, new monsters, weapons, bonuses and dungeons will appear. To win the game you must explore several dimensions without dying. The adventure can be played with up to 4 players in co-op.

name: After Sunset

Dive into a world where gangsters lurk, and true love Amy reappears. Your goals are clear: Achieve Career Success, Get Married, and Earn Respect.

The difficulty generally scales from IWAD difficulty to Scythe 2, but great care has been given to pacing and making sure each map flows in a cohesive manner.

Engage in intense competition with players from around the world, master strategic combos, and explore the intriguing backstories of each of our uniquely designed stars. AFK Football isn't just another sports game—it's an epic journey in the quest for world football domination!

It was developed by IR Gurus and was the final AFL game to be published by Acclaim Entertainment, before their bankruptcy on 1 September 2004.

name: Afterlands

While being Single-Player oriented, Afterlands can also be played in Co-op and Deathmatch modes, however due to the large map sizes, the latter is discouraged. Like in it's predecessors, there are numerous unmarked secrets throughout the span of the Hub, as well as two secret levels, one you can access early in the game, and another that is accessible towards the end of the WAD.

name: After... Wasureenu Kizuna
summary:
The story in this game consists of two main parts. First part focusing on school days and a group of students who set out on a hiking trip in Japanese Alps. However, the protagonist of the story, Yuuichi Takawashi, dies in an accident during mountain climbing. But because of the reincarnation process of the soul, Yuuichi's memories are played. But in order to playback the memories of the soul, it is necessary to have someone in your heart who you really want to meet. And so the story flashback to the memories of high-school when you were in third year and play until the day of your accident. Second part start with Yuuichi waking up in a hospital. But not is his own body, but rather in that of whomever you made heroine in the first part of the story. Your soul is sort-of possessing that person's body. You want to tell people you know that you are still alive somehow, but because you are not really you, it appears to be rather difficult feat to achieve. But it is a matter of time when the soul decides to merge, and because two souls cannot forever occupy the same body, the one that doesn't merge will disappear, and if Yuuichi's soul merges, he will continue to live on in this body.

This visual novel plays just as typically, you read through the text with static backgrounds and non-animated characters and occasionally make choices that may propel the story toward a certain direction. There are also unlockable CG scenes and background music which can be viewed from gallery.

Dreamcast and PlayStation 2 ports feature some new characters and scenarios which are not present in PC version.

Afterlife Harem has been out for a while and has a lot of content. (6000+ renders!); Over 50 h-scenes featuring most of the characters you meet during the game. (300+ animations!); Afterlife Harem has a lot of quests that will help you unlock new scenes and follow the main storyline; Most of the girls you meet can become love interests - or at least it's possible to become intimate with them; (NEW) Dating app: It's like a minigame inside Afterlife Harem :D

summary: Afterlight Catacombs is a horror exploration game in which you attempt to escape a procedurally-generated labyrinth while a mysterious stalker chases you in the dark. Explore the winding tunnels, learn the secret about this dungeon and, above all, do not let your torch run out!

name: Aftercare Sessions
summary: Aftercare Sessions is a short episode dedicated to provide very easy maps. It features light combat, very easy exploration and snack-sized pace, with each map taking no more than 2 minutes. Just jump in and unwind a little.

name: After Death
summary: After Death is a police horror videogame based on real events, where the fate of Bisman is in your hands. Prosecutor Bisman is murdered, next to his body there is only his ghost, without memories, wanting to solve the mystery of his own death. Meanwhile, the Reaper is on the prowl...

name: After Inc.
summary:
Can you rebuild civilization after a zombie apocalypse? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique blend of strategic simulation, survival city builder and 'mini 4X!

Decades after the Necroa Virus ravaged humanity, a few survivors emerge. Build a settlement, explore, scavenge resources and expand as you shape your post-apocalyptic society. The world is green and beautiful but danger lurks in the ruins!

name: After The End
summary: In AFTER THE END, you will lead a group of survivors in a world devastated by a zombie apocalypse. Face resource scarcity, such as food and medicine, while dealing with the constant threat of zombie hordes and armed human enemies. Every decision can mean the difference between life and death, and permanent death means every choice has lasting consequences. With multiple playable characters, each with their own skills and stories, you must build and protect your base, manage your resources wisely, and fight to survive in a relentless environment.

name: AfterM.A.T.H.
summary: "AfterM.A.T.H. (Mobile Arsenal Tactical Hunter)" is a sci-fi action game where players pilot advanced mechs to combat the deadly Venomarch creatures. Engage in diverse missions including enemy elimination, hive destruction, new weapon testing, and giant boss battles in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: A Friday Night Real Music Funkin Game
summary: A Friday Night Real Music Funkin Game with all songs Friday Night Funkin Music Smoke Em' Out Struggle Full Combo. You are the best and beat all your opponents in this game.

name: A Few Days With: Emma
summary: Embark on a sensual Christmas Baubles hunting adventure with Emma, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Emma's enticing layers.

name: A Few Days With: Bianca
summary: Embark on a sensual butterfly-hunting adventure with Bianca, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Bianca's enticing layers.

name: Affection: San Shimai to Juusha no Shoujo
A Forest Tale: Porasy
summary:
Embark on a journey through a new mythological realm as Porasy, an Indigenous warrior. Explore uncharted landscapes, unleash the power of Muiraquitãs, unravel your story, and vanquish the Seven Legendary Beasts to carve your own legend. Are you ready to dive into this epic adventure?

Porasy is an indie platformer that combines the thrill of classic 2D action with the rich, untold stories of the Tupi-Guarani mythology. Inspired by childhood favorites like Sonic and MegaMan, Porasy brings a fresh challenge to the platforming genre, immersing players in a dangerous, atmospheric world of Brazilian folklore.

name: A Few Days With: Valentina
summary: Embark on a sensual heart-hunting adventure with Valentina, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Valentina's enticing layers.

name: A Frog in a Well
summary: This is a hellishly difficult 2D pixel platformer/avoidance game, one of the toughest you've ever seen. You play as a space miner trapped in a mental world by alien monsters, repeatedly escaping the depths of a well and striving to reach your own blue sky, just like a frog at the bottom of the well.

name: After Friday
summary: After Friday is a psychological horror game. Every late Friday night on your way home, you sense that someone—or something—is following you. At the same time, your memories begin to fade—perhaps they were never important to begin with.

name: AFL 26
summary: Get ready for the future of footy with AFL 26. Feel every hit, hear every roar, and live every moment with unmatched authenticity and intensity. From the first bounce to the final siren, the action is fast, fierce, and true to the game. With lifelike gameplay, roaring crowds, expert commentary, and all the drama of real AFL, you’re not just watching the game — you’re in it. This is footy, redefined.

name: After Exposure
summary: A small adventure

name: A Friend in Need
summary:
A long lost friend with a secret needs your help. Will you?

Play a character down on their luck, who is paid a visit by a long lost friend with a secret. When shadowy forces show up, who will you trust? The choices you make will determine not only your friend's fate, but yours.

name: Afterglow: The Fifth Ending
summary: A Memory Maze Spanning Life and Death: A Tender Web of Salvation and Deception Follow protagonist Ye Yuyao into the Tai Xu. Through fragmented memories and relentless inquiry, unravel the hidden truth behind an anonymous organ donor in this haunting interplay of light and shadow.

name: After Inc: Revival
summary: Can you rebuild civilisation after a zombie apocalypse? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique blend of strategic simulation, survival city builder and ‘mini 4X’. Build settlements, harvest resources and shape society as you lead Humanity out of the darkness.

name: Aftershock
summary: Put yourself in the shoes of a combat veteran. Can you handle the hardships that come with a life of solitude?

name: [Afantasia]
summary: A boy bargained his memories for the ability to imagine. Now, his hometown of Tempo is a blur between reality and imagination. A voice called Intrusion guides him as he uncovers fragments of a past he traded away, before his identity fades completely.

name: After Juice: Animal Disco Mafia
summary: Welcome to this graphic adventure! You play as a little hamster named Tofu. You will join him on a series of adventures trough university nights, in a city full of parties and mistery, tons of humor and bad jokes, but above all..... Dru.... i mean, SUGAR!

name: After Lights Out
summary: After Lights Out is a first person psychological horror game. Players will explore a terrifying house that keeps changing in the dark. Use the lights to solve the puzzles and uncover the hidden truth in the room.

name: AFK Shift
summary: Streamer has gone AFK. What could go wrong? Tune in to abandoned livestreams, watch for unexpected changes and sinister anomalies, and report them for remediation before they can permanently corrupt reality!

name: A Flame in the Dark
summary: Navigate the darkest of dungeons equipped with only a torch. Explore, solve puzzles, and find a path forward to help the next adventurer before your only light source burns out in this unique roguelite!

name: A Farewell To AI
summary:
In a future where drawing is forbidden, your lines move the story.

A new experience awaits: an AI × drawing × visual novel adventure that brings your creativity to life.

name: After the End Fan Fork
summary: Play anywhere in North America, the Caribbean, or the northern coast of South America in the year 2666, centuries after a cataclysmic Event knocked human civilization back to the medieval era. Featuring over a thousand provinces, 47 different religions (most of which are unique to AtE), and 31 different culture groups. (Not individual cultures - culture groups.)

name: After the End
summary: After the End is a total conversion mod and successor to the popular CK II mod, bringing Crusader Kings III to the post-post apocalyptic Americas. Covering all of the Americas, After the End takes place long after a great cataclysm, the Event, wiped out modern society. Centuries later new neo-medieval societies have risen from the ashes.

name: After The End: Southern Land
summary: After The End: Southern Land is a total conversion mod that brings the setting of the popular CK2 and CK3 mod After The End, to the green and gold land of Australia. In 2666 long after the mysterious and apocalyptic Event, Australia has been transformed into an arena of diverse neo-medieval societies each with their own interpretation of the once Lucky Country.

name: A Few Quick Matches
summary: A FEW QUICK MATCHES is a fast-paced, 1-4 player platform fighter that lets you bring old-school stick battles to life! play with your friends locally, or challenge players online in this flash-inspired spectacle!

name: Afei's Trouble
summary: AFei's Trouble is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer where you'll have to beat levels and challenge your final enemies, full of monsters and giant bosses waiting to be challenged to slash you out. Fight your way until you reach the final boss and dodge its kill, and see how long you can survive.

name: A Father's Tale
summary: After the tragic loss of his son, a father gets stuck inside a magic drawing book that contains magic places and dangerous creatures. Experience this journey through grief and restore the joy and color of this kingdom by solving puzzles and defeating evil monsters.

name: Afterblast
summary: Afterblast is an exhilarating, high-octane multiplayer first-person shooter that takes action to new heights with its dynamic parkour mechanics.

name: After Dark
summary: After Dark is a horror adventure game filled with monsters, oddities, and more! Traverse a strange, other-worldly forest to rescue your sister and bring her back home! There will be many dangers along the way, can you survive?

name: Afterbright
summary: You play as jaded police officer Mark Langford in this first-person psychological horror game. An investigation into the case of a missing child draws you to an old apartment complex, uncovering horrors and trauma that refuse to stay buried.

name: A Field of Flowers
summary: In this norse-inspired metroidvania, explore and seek truths of what truly happened to you, having lost your home and your only friend in a single night. Fight and copy new magic from others to gain power, as you swear revenge on a mysterious stranger that took everything from you.

name: Affiliated Homies
summary: Banana!

name: After Work
summary: Welcome to SPARK, a well renounced photography company. Here you'll find love, learn about consent, and meet friends. Use your observation skills to unfold motivation and stories behind characters. Be careful. You don't want it to end badly.

name: A Fistfull of Cowboys
summary: Ultra hyper auto-shooting cowboy mayhem

name: After the Janazah
summary:
Go to Baba's funeral.

Made for the Neo-Twiny 2024 Jam. Word count: 499 words.

name: After The Afterlife
summary: After The Afterlife: A challenging 2D platformer that puts your parkour skills to the test. Help our main character overcome every obstacle standing in their way as they strive to complete their journey!

name: Afterschool : Reel Danger
summary: Afterschool: Reel Danger is a fast-paced roguelite survival game with 2D pixel graphics. Choose from three different characters, face off against waves of zombies, earn money, and upgrade your skills from the Merchant & Enchanter to defeat stronger enemies!

name: After-H: Moon of the Dead
summary: Whether you're a seasoned fighter or a rookie, take on the Moon of the Dead challenge, where zombie survival is your only option. From 1 to 10 players, get ready for an immersive experience unique in the world, where you move freely over 500 m². Push back your limits, just as we're pushing back those of virtual reality.

name: After Heaven
summary: Battle relentless zombie hordes in this dark, action-survival shooter. Fight close-up, use sound to survive, and manage healing wisely—or face side effects. Intense combat, eerie atmosphere, and no mercy. How long can you last when death is always near?

name: After Burner
summary: Game Boy Advance port of arcade game After Burner, included in Sega Arcade Gallery.

name: After Burner
summary:
Muster up all the skill, reflexes and guts you've got. Because inside your F-14 Thunder Cat, you're going to need all that - and more.

Blast laser-directed, anti-aircraft fire at enemy planes. Dodge heat-seeking missiles with fancy flywork, like dips, turns and barrel rolls. Come head to head with the infamous Flying Fortresses (the toughest of all enemies) and dogfight your way through, to a nanosecond of safety.

And if you make it far enough, a fuel tanker will be waiting for you. Dock successfully and you'll replenish valuable energy and ammunition.

Despite its title, this game is actually a port of After Burner II.

name: After Burner
summary: A port of After Burner II released on Family Computer by Sunsoft.

name: After Burner
summary: An Atari ST port of After Burner II. This version was later ported to Amiga and released in Europe.

name: After Burner
summary: An Amiga conversion of Atari ST port of After Burner II for the European market. A different port for Amiga was released in US the following year.

name: After Burner
summary: An Amiga port of After Burner II for the North American market. This version differs from the European version in that it has a different soundtrack and uses a full-screen display, though it runs more slowly.

name: After Burner
summary:
European Commodore 64 port of After Burner II.

Two versions exist for the Commodore 64, built by entirely different teams for different markets. The earlier North American version is played in full screen and is arguably the more accurate of the two, but runs slower, has a very limited HUD and has no in-game music. The European version, by contrast, is faster and has music, but plays in a window. There are also colour clashing issues when enemy planes are drawn above the ground, and the level order is different.

name: After Burner
summary:
North American Commodore 64 port of After Burner II.

Two versions exist for the Commodore 64, built by entirely different teams for different markets. The earlier North American version is played in full screen and is arguably the more accurate of the two, but runs slower, has a very limited HUD and has no in-game music. The European version, by contrast, is faster and has music, but plays in a window. There are also colour clashing issues when enemy planes are drawn above the ground, and the level order is different.

name: After Burner
summary: An Amstrad CPC port of arcade game After Burner II.

name: After Burner
summary: A Sharp X68000 port of arcade game After Burner II.

name: After Burner II
summary: A PC Engine port of arcade game After Burner II.

name: After Burner II
summary: A Sega Genesis port of arcade game After Burner II.

name: After Burner III
summary: After Burner III is a Sega CD port of Japan-only arcade game Strike Fighter.

name: AFK GF
summary:
Joseph is a computer science major who has failed in nearly every aspect of his life. He struggles with his relationships, he struggles to cling onto his waifu as escapism, and he can't seem to find a way to help himself.

You, as the player—who bought the game? Joseph? The observer of Joseph? The protagonist of a different game? Whatever you are, you are tasked with the responsibility of understanding the many different avenues to piece together why Joseph is ultimately a cautionary tale to the human race.

AFK GF is a visual novel with a dark, satirical tone, blending social commentary, psychological horror, and meta storytelling. Embrace the absurd and the uncomfortable as you step into the fragmented mind of a broken man trying to make sense of his deteriorating and meaningless life.

name: African Adventure: In Search of Dr. Livingston
After Hell Freezes Over
summary: Venture into the desolate frozen wasteland in this open-world survival horror. Struggle to survive in the cold, where strange creatures roam in the darkness. Build a shelter, collect supplies, fend off unimaginable threats, and fight for survival After Hell Freezes Over.

name: A Few Days With: Amber
summary: Embark on a sensual butterfly-hunting adventure with Amber, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Amber's enticing layers.

name: After Mankind: TD
summary: A sci-fi Tower Defense game where you build your own towers by combining different modules to create unique structures. The damage system and unique enemies will force you to choose weapons for each threat separately. Study the glossary to learn more about each enemy.

name: A Familiar World
summary: Solve jigsaw puzzles to unlock exciting scenes. Discover the mysterious circumstances that led nine women to leave their world and run towards a new life.

name: After Hours: Library
summary: Survive a full night shift of relentless horror. Balance librarian duties with stealth, outsmart a monster that hunts by sound and sight, and uncover hidden areas filled with dark lore.

name: After Long Night
summary: Welcome to the real apocalypse. After Long Night is a sandbox survival RTS where you take on a world completely overrun by the undead. Scavenge a ruined city, build your shelter, and lead a survivor army in the face of overwhelming zombie hordes. Will you fortify your defenses—or strike first? The choice is yours.

name: A Few Nights With: Margaret
summary: Embark on a sensual spider-hunting adventure with Margaret, a mysterious young woman who lives in a cabin overrun by spiders. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Margaret's enticing layers.

name: A Few Nights With: Francesca
summary: Embark on a sensual bat-hunting adventure with Francesca, a mysterious young woman who lives in a medieval castle overrun by bats. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Francesca's enticing layers.

name: A Fool's Errand
summary: Crank to ascend the infinitely-spiralling tower, dodging its many devious traps and creepy denizens.

name: After Dark
summary: After Dark is a first-person endless wave zombie shooter set across multiple locations. Survive as long as you can against relentless hordes of the dead in a fight that only ends when you do.

name: After Midnight
summary: Open-world, online multiplayer ghost hunting game that plunges you into a vast and eerie world filled with haunted locations waiting to be discovered. Whether you're braving the darkness alone or teaming up with friends, your mission is to identify the terrifying entities lurking within this world.

name: Aftershock
summary: An earthquake has just struck the building you’re in — and caught off guard, you’ll have only moments to react. Every step could mean the difference between life and death.

name: After the End
summary: Explore the shattered world of Midgard in this 2D Viking RPG set after Ragnarok. Battle undead warriors, uncover ancient ruins, and carve your path through a land scarred by gods and giants. Survive, rebuild, and forge your saga in a broken world.

name: After the Curtain Call
summary: After the Curtain Call is a first-person, narrative puzzle game, which holds the story of Yujin who thinks her life as a play. She uses a special 'dimension camera' to switch the dimension of objects and solve puzzles. Through the journey, she face the truth that was forgotten...

name: After School Cure
summary: In After School Cure (Adventure Game / Visual Novel) play as the spirit Kimiko, and recruit a new member to the spirits living in the school.

name: After School Grounds
summary: You're the last student left. The schoolyard is now filled with strange, terrifying creatures. Grab your pencil, ruler, eraser, or scissors—anything you can use as a weapon. Fight to survive in an abandoned school where peace depends on you. The battle begins now!

name: After the Crash: Colony
summary: Build order on a strange planet, keep your crew alive, and gather the parts needed to repair the crashed main ship. Manage resources, explore new areas, face growing threats, and strengthen your colony a little more with each passing day.

name: After the Melodrama Novel
summary: Play as the once-villainous second female lead after the melodrama ends. Return home to build and manage your own orchard, recruit awakened novel characters, and grow relationships and profits in this short, thoughtful management simulation.

name: A Fugu's Dive
summary: A glimpse into the daily life of a Fugu.

name: A Factory Roguelike
summary: Engineer an efficient production pipeline to keep up with the increasing demand rates of the Boxes. Choose reward bundles and research modules strategically to expand your factory and optimize efficiency.

name: Aftermath
summary:
Alone in an infested city, you must survive the night.
Use your skills with flashlight, guns and grenades to evade and destroy the city's deadly inhabitants.

name: Aftermath Z: Red Pine Lake
summary: Aftermath Z: Red Pine Lake is survival horror game with a chilling 80s slasher vibe. Experience a gripping single-player story and thrilling multiplayer modes. Unravel the virus mystery, battle zombies in Horde Mode, or outwit the infected slasher in the unique asymmetrical Infected Mode.

name: AFAR: An Interactive Horror Film
summary: A survival horror experience inspired by 90s FMV games and VHS nightmares. Choose your path as a paranormal investigator in a haunting interactive film and uncover the secrets of Barlang Valley. Every choice you make shapes the story—leading to new scenes, multiple endings, and many ways to die.

name: A Few Days With: Zoey
summary: Embark on a sensual Easter Egg-hunting adventure with Zoey, a fun young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Zoey's enticing layers.

name: Afterglow Bytes: Reverie by the Shore
summary: Run a cozy izakaya in futuristic Bali. Grill skewers, serve patrons, help wandering spirits, and manage supplies to keep your evening haven alive. Every night tells a new story.

name: A Frog in a Small Pond
summary: It is a game in which a frog that has heard about the sea from another frog goes on an adventure. Help the frog go through the forest and into the sea.

name: Affraid
summary: AFFRAID is a third-person horror game where you explore corridors and fight zombies. The combat mechanics are strongly inspired by the game Resident Evil 3. The main character is quite sexy.

name: A Favor For The Alchemist
summary: A short and sweet escape room style puzzle game about using alchemy ingredients and brainpower to repair the alchemist's broken machinery!

name: After the Wane
summary: Retracing the footsteps of a mother she never knew, Lena's trying to make it as a dancer in the city. Caught in a quarrel between dance companies, dealing with love and heartbreak and the challenges of young adulthood, she must also cope with the voice in her head commenting on everything she does.

name: A Fly in the Array
summary: An insect seeks treasure. Beware the crawlies, trust your axe, gold awaits in the sunnup..
